name.th: Lordz.IO เวอร์ชันต้นฉบับ

short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Lordz.IO Original extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Изиграйте разширението Lordz.IO Original - Можете също да играете без интернет, опитайте го сега!
short.ca: Juga a Lordz.IO Original, l'extensió - També es pot jugar sense Internet, prova-ho ara!
short.cs: Hrajte rozšíření Lordz.IO Original - Můžete také hrát bez připojení k internetu, vyzkoušejte to teď!
short.da: Spil Lordz.IO Original-udvidelsen - Kan også spilles uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de,hr,nl,uk: Spielen Sie die Lordz.IO Original-Erweiterung - Sie können es auch ohne Internet spielen, probieren Sie es jetzt aus!
short.el: Juega Lordz.IO Original extension - También puedes jugar sin internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.es: Juega la extensión original de Lordz.IO - También se puede jugar sin conexión a internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Jouez à Lordz.IO Original extension - Vous pouvez aussi jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.fi: Pelaa Lordz.IO:n alkuperäistä laajennusta - Voit myös pelata ilman internet-yhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Lordz.IO Original na extension - Maaari ring laruin nang walang internet, subukan ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à l'extension originale de Lordz.IO - Vous pouvez également jouer sans internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.he: הורד את התוסף המקורי של Lordz.IO - ניתן גם לשחק ללא חיבור לאינטרנט, נסה עכשיו!
short.hi: Juega la extensión original de Lordz.IO - También puedes jugar sin internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.hu: Játssz a Lordz.IO eredeti kiterjesztésével - Próbáld ki internetkapcsolat nélkül is!
short.id,ms: Mainkan ekstensi Lordz.IO Original - Juga bisa dimainkan tanpa internet, coba sekarang!
short.it: Gioca all'estensione originale di Lordz.IO - Puoi anche giocare senza internet, provaci ora!
short.ja: ロードズIOオリジナル拡張をプレイしましょう - インターネットなしでもプレイ可能です、今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 로츠.IO 오리지널 확장판을 플레이하세요. 인터넷 없이도 플레이 가능합니다. 지금 바로 해보세요!
short.lt: Groti Lordz.IO Original plėtinį - Taip pat galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlēt Lordz.IO Original paplašinājumu - Var spēlēt arī bez interneta, izmēģini tagad!
short.no: Juega a Lordz.IO Original - También se puede jugar sin conexión a internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.pl: Zagraj w rozszerzenie Lordz.IO Original - Można również grać bez połączenia internetowego, wypróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă extensia Lordz.IO Original - Poți juca și fără internet, încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в расширение Lordz.IO Original - также можете играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Juega a Lordz.IO Original extension, ¡también se puede jugar sin conexión a internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.sr: Играјте Lordz.IO Original расширење - Такође можете играти без Интернета, пробајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Lordz.IO Original-förlängningen - Kan också spelas utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่น Lordz.IO Original extension - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ตเลย ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Juega al Lordz.IO Original - También puedes jugar sin Internet, ¡inténtalo ahora!
short.vi: Chơi Lordz.IO phiên bản gốc - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, hãy thử ngay!
short.zh_CN: 玩《Lordz.IO Original》扩展 - 也可以离线玩，现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 玩Lordz.IO原始擴展-也可以在沒有網路的情況下玩，立即試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏹 Lordz.IO Original - Conquer the Realm, Rule the Leaderboard!

Embark on a medieval conquest with Lordz.IO Original, a thrilling and unblocked multiplayer strategy game that pits you against players from around the world. 🌍 Lead your army, build your kingdom, and rise to the top of the leaderboard in this epic battle of strategy and skill.

⚔️ Medieval Warfare: Immerse yourself in a world of medieval warfare, where armies clash, castles rise, and empires fall. Strategize your moves, assemble a powerful army, and dominate the battlefield.

🏰 Build Your Empire: Construct mighty castles, expand your territory, and fortify your defenses. Lordz.IO Original allows you to build and customize your kingdom, creating a formidable stronghold to withstand enemy attacks.

👑 Rule the Leaderboard: Compete against players worldwide to claim the top spot on the leaderboard. Only the most cunning and strategic lords will earn their place as rulers of the realm. Will you rise to the challenge?

🤺 Epic Battles: Engage in epic battles where every decision matters. Lead your troops into the fray, capture enemy territory, and outsmart opponents to secure victory. The battlefield is your domain; conquer it with tactical brilliance.

🛡️ Unblocked & Free: Enjoy uninterrupted gameplay with Lordz.IO Original. Access the game freely, conquer foes, and lead your army to glory without any restrictions. The battle for supremacy is open to all.

🏹 Choose Your Units: From fearless knights to powerful dragons, assemble a diverse army to suit your playstyle. Each unit brings unique strengths to the battlefield. Experiment with different strategies to find your winning combination.

🌟 Strategic Mastery: Success in Lordz.IO Original requires strategic thinking and diplomatic finesse. Form alliances with other players, negotiate treaties, or wage war—your choices will shape the fate of your kingdom.

🚀 Constant Updates: Experience a game that evolves with you. Lordz.IO Original receives regular updates, introducing new features, units, and challenges to keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.

👑 Prove Your Dominance: Are you ready to stake your claim as the ultimate lord of the realm? Unleash your strategic prowess, command your army, and strive for dominance in Lordz.IO Original. Install now and become a legend on the battlefield! 🏆🏰
Play more games on the top-left menu.
